allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove default filter sets, start with empty filters

The hardcoded Errors, Client Command, AET warning, and Bigfoot General
filter sets have been removed. New installations start with no filters.
Renamed "Reset All to Defaults" button to "Clear All Filters".

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
